degrees.university: California Polytechnic State University, San Luis Obispo

jobs.title: Senior UI Engineer
duties: Member of the core Developer Experience team supporting the front end development teams within Cisco's Customer & Partner Experience (CPX) organization.

Developed an analytics dashboard from the ground up, using the latest in Angular technologies and best practices, to report developer code metrics that promote better code quality for the front end development teams and to provide insights and metrics at a high level for management.
Designed the analytics dashboard to leverage the tooling and structure from Nx, the Router and Component Stores from NgRx, Angular's new standalone API, and the ability to parse the AST via linting.

Employed best practices for using shared/common components, layouts, and styling, and for writing unit and component tests such that the analytics dashboard can serve as a reference app for the organization.
Integrated the analytics dashboard into the same build and deployment pipelines within CircleCI that the other front end applications use.

jobs.title: Staff Software Engineer
duties: Lead front-end web developer for GV AMPP Asset Management, a next generation cloud-based platform that facilitates media asset management and remote production for the video broadcast industry.
Helped to design and develop the UI for managing, updating, displaying, and searching across assets and asset metadata.
Worked on the core UI framework which was developed using TypeScript and Angular and was designed to run within a cloud-based microservice architecture.
Helped to design and develop the Windows-based video production and content management application, called GV STRATUS, using C# and WPF.
Participated in the design and development of a configuration and software deployment tool that on-site personnel use to commission and update customers' Grass Valley systems.
Worked on adding new features to an application that managed content for Grass Valley's line of video servers.

jobs.title: Software Engineer (Contractor)
duties: Worked on the C# Windows-based RF measurement software for the spectrum analyzer product line
Helped to develop the automated nightly build system using scripting.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
duties: Developed Windows-based applications that create test signals for satellite and cellular base station testing.
Worked on software to enable importing RF acquisition data directly into Excel spreadsheets or Word documents.
